title: Long-term Side Effects of COVID-19 Vaccine? What We Know
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Resources and Our Response Virginia Gay Hospital and Clinics created this web page for information about the COVID-19 virus and responses by VGH to provide care to patients and the communities we serve. Please call ahead if you are experiencing symptoms of the flu or COVID-19. The hospital's main number is [319-472-6200.](tel:319-472-6200.) Clinic [319-228-8000](tel:319-228-8000) Vinton: [319-472-6300](tel:319-472-6300) For more information please visit our Covid Resources page
